plot: Four secret crime fighters are tasked with a mission to prevent a computer virus from affecting all major banks across the nation. They must locate the cyber gang responsible for the plot and stop the virus from leaking out.
plot_en: Four secret crime fighters are tasked with a mission to prevent a computer virus from affecting all major banks across the nation. They must locate the cyber gang responsible for the plot and stop the virus from leaking out.
plot_es: Four secret crime fighters are tasked with a mission to prevent a computer virus from affecting all major banks across the nation. They must locate the cyber gang responsible for the plot and stop the virus from leaking out.
title: Mission on Fire
